org.cip4.elk.alces.preprocessor.jmf
Class XPathPreprocessor

java.lang.Object
  org.cip4.elk.alces.preprocessor.jmf.XPathPreprocessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Preprocessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
URLPreprocessor
public class XPathPreprocessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Preprocessor

A preprocessor that sets a node selected by an XPaths to a new value.

Author:
Claes Buckwalter (clabu@itn.liu.se)

Method Detail

setXpathValuePairs

public void setXpathValuePairs(java.util.Map xpathValuePairs)
Sets the XPaths and the corresponding value that each XPath will replace the node it selects with.

Parameters:
xpathValuePairs - XPath expressions as keys; the new values as values

setDefaultNsPrefix

public void setDefaultNsPrefix(java.lang.String defaultNsPrefix)
Sets the prefix to use for XML documents that have a 'default namespace'. All namespaces need a prefix in order to be used in XPath expressions.

Parameters:
defaultNsPrefix -
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the String is null or of length zero

preprocess

public Message preprocess(Message message,
                          PreprocessorContext context)
                   throws PreprocessorException
Preprocesses a message replacing all values that match the configured XPath expressions with their value pairs.

Specified by:
preprocess in interface Preprocessor
Parameters:

the preprocessed message
